bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
We need to fix it. <denchmark-code>cd build && ./tests/unittest_common && cd .. Illegal instruction (core dumped) debian/rules:40: recipe for target 'override_dh_auto_test' failed make[1]: *** [override_dh_auto_test] Error 132 make[1]: Leaving directory '/<<PKGBUILDDIR>>' debian/rules:27: recipe for target 'build' failed make: *** [build] Error 2 dpkg-buildpackage: error: debian/rules build gave error exit status 2 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Build finished at 20190130-1509
Finished -------- </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1110>#1110</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
